ns2:test-suite.name: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application and search for buses
test-case.title: Login into the application and search for buses

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.redbus.in"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.redbus.in"

step.name: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"
step.title: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"

step.name: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"
step.title: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"

step.name: Then I enter "onward" travel Month as "Jun 2020" and date as "18"
step.title: Then I enter "onward" travel Month as "Jun 2020" and date as "18"

step.name: Then I enter "Return" travel Month for return as "July 2020" and date as "28"
step.title: Then I enter "Return" travel Month for return as "July 2020" and date as "28"

step.name: And I click on Search Buses button
step.title: And I click on Search Buses button

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application and search for buses

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

label.value: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials
